about_the_game:
This is a text-novel style adventure game where the protagonist is a demon.

It takes about 15 minutes to complete one playthrough.

If you try to collect all the endings, it may take a little longer.

Play time may vary depending on the ending and the level of exploration.

During exploration, you can choose actions like "talk," "poltergeist," "dream visitation," and "curse."

One day, all of a sudden, you became a ghost.

You've never done anything bad, so you should definitely be able to go to Heaven.

You never doubted that.

But...

No matter how wonderful Heaven is,

if you're not there, it would be more terrifying than Hell.

(That's right!)

If I can't go to see you, then I'll just have to make you come to me.

Before Heaven's gates open, I will definitely

bring you over to this side.

About the Demo Version: Play up to the first bad ending or until the start of day 4.

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 and up
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 4GB VRAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: This app features mouse, keyboard controls and partial controller support with the Xbox controller. Touch screen is not supported.
